title: Mound Building Termites
author: Unknown
pages:
Mound Building
Termites are a group
of termite species
that live in mounds
(Crazy right!) These
termites live in Africa,
Australia and South
America. The mounds
are usually located in
well drained areas
and usually out live
the colonies
themselves
These termites can
build enormous
mounds, A mound
discovered in Africa
was 42 feet high,
which is approximately
the height of a
Brachiosaurus!
